text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Satellaview is an extension of the Super Famicom, released only in Japan in 1995. It was also known by the initials 'BS-X' standing for 'Broadcast Satellite'. This satellite tuner system came with a 'BS-X' type cartridge containing an 8 Mbit memory card. Thus it made it possible to connect to a service for downloading games, codes and information. All data passed through a television station named St.GIGA. You had to download the games distributed in several parts and play them when they were released.
